title: Did Nancy Pelosi routinely use a 200-seat "big fat plane" to travel to California?
subtitle: Rumor has it that Nancy Belusi refused to use the "Special House President's little jet" and demanded that it be replaced by "a big, fat plane with 200 seats."
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: Nancy Belusi, a house talker, was routinely using a 200-seat, big, fat plane to travel between California and D.C.
